actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to facilitate the exchange of school lands between the State of Utah and the Navajo Tribe.

summary.text: Provides that the State of Utah may relinquish such tracts of school land, including mineral rights, within specified areas of the Navajo Reservation to the United States in trust for the Navajo Tribe. Provides that the State of Utah shall have the right to select other unreserved lands in the State of Utah equal in area to those relinquished.

titles.title: A bill to facilitate the exchange of school lands between the State of Utah and the Navajo Tribe.
